text: Sredi lyudey yest' i takiye, Kto poklonyayetsya Allakhu, No v etom stoykosti v nikh net, (Net i reshitel'nosti tverdoy): Yesli postignet ikh udacha, Oni spokoyno s neyu prebyvayut, No stoit ispytaniyu obrushit'sya na nikh, Oni k bylomu lik vorotyat, Utrativ (etim) i zemnuyu zhizn', I zhizn' budushchego mira, - A eto - yavnaya poterya
